member.name: T:Trinsic.Base64Url
member.summary: Encodes and Decodes strings as Base64Url encoding.

member.name: M:Trinsic.Base64Url.Encode(System.String)
member.summary: The following functions perform base64url encoding which differs from regular base64 encoding as follows * padding is skipped so the pad character '=' doesn't have to be percent encoded * the 62nd and 63rd regular base64 encoding characters ('+' and '/') are replace with ('-' and '_') The changes make the encoding alphabet file and URL safe.
member.param: string to encode.
member.returns: Base64Url encoding of the UTF8 bytes.

member.name: M:Trinsic.Base64Url.Encode(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a subset of an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with base-64-url digits. Parameters specify the subset as an offset in the input array, and the number of elements in the array to convert.
member.param: An array of 8-bit unsigned integers.
An offset in inArray.
The number of elements of inArray to convert.
member.returns: The string representation in base 64 url encodingof length elements of inArray, starting at position offset.
member.exception: offset or length is negative OR offset plus length is greater than the length of inArray.

member.name: M:Trinsic.Base64Url.Encode(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts a subset of an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with base-64-url digits. Parameters specify the subset as an offset in the input array, and the number of elements in the array to convert.
member.param: An array of 8-bit unsigned integers.
member.returns: The string representation in base 64 url encodingof length elements of inArray, starting at position offset.
member.exception: offset or length is negative OR offset plus length is greater than the length of inArray.

member.name: M:Trinsic.Base64Url.DecodeBytes(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified string, which encodes binary data as base-64-url digits, to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer array.
member.param: base64Url encoded string.
member.returns: UTF8 bytes.

member.name: M:Trinsic.Base64Url.Decode(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes the string from Base64UrlEncoded to UTF8.
member.param: string to decode.
member.returns: UTF8 string.
